abstract: New Hampshire's annual Democratic convention sees presidential candidate Hilary Rodham Clinton trumpet key endorsements from state leaders, while rival Sen Bernie Sanders, who leads polls in state, elicits more boisterous response; crowds join other candidates in calling for more debates than currently scheduled.
lead_paragraph: Mrs. Clinton turned to New Hampshire Democratic officials for help in fighting the surging campaign of Mr. Sanders for the presidential nomination.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton and Bernie Sanders, in Own Ways, Show Pull at New Hampshire Convention
headline.print_headline: Clinton and Sanders, in Own Ways, Show Pull at New Hampshire Convention

snippet: Mrs. Clinton turned to New Hampshire Democratic officials for help in fighting the surging campaign of Mr. Sanders for the presidential nomination.
